<<<<<<< HEAD
Divine meditations written by an honourable person ; whereto is adjoyned a determination of the question, whether men ought to keele at the receipt of the holy communion ; and an essay of friends.
[2], 162 p.
Printed by T. Badger for Humphrey Mosley, London : 1641.
"An essay of friendship," p. [133] - 154 has special t.p. dated 1640. "Appendix of love and friends," p. 156-162. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
